message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll love. My asking price is $95. Let me know what you think!
I'm still a bit higher than that
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $90 would be my final offer.  Let me know if that works for you.
I'm getting close, but I can do a bit better
